The study enrol patient treat accord standard protocol use hematologic department . Scheme treatment : alternating cycle R-CHOP R-AraC : R-CHOP / R-AraC / R-CHOP / R-AraC / R-CHOP / R-AraC . Baseline procedure : - CT PET-CT ( positron emission tomography compute tomography ) start treatment , 3 cycle end treatment ( 6 cycle ) - bone marrow examination therapy , 3 cycle completion induction - maintenance rituximab base standard centre The study propose base previously publish data young patient , demonstrate improved outcome implementation Ara-C induction . Primary objective include response induction PET-CT PFS ( progression-free survival ) .
